name: Tragic Magic
description:
A prototype developed for the Global Game Jam 2015 by four students at Abertay University (Scotland) in Unity.

Two players sit with a Leap Motion Controller between them and use it's tool tracking feature to track their wands. Combos can be entered using the four elemental buttons, the spells are described in the four spell books which accompany the machine. The wands are then used to aim and cast the spell chosen.*
